wobani.component.renderable

Class RenderableComponent<T extends Renderable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.core.Component
      • wobani.component.renderable.RenderableComponent<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentBase, Invalidatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MeshComponent, SplineComponent

    public abstract class RenderableComponent<T extends Renderable>
extends Component
    Contains a Renderable what you can render.
